title: I can't use masteries

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So I've been playing several games of league today, in one random match I wanted to make a kindred mastery on the fly.
Ever since then I can't use my masteries on any champion, in select or out of select. Draft or blind or aram.
I just get this error then my game loads up and I have no masteries.

replies.body:
I have seen something like this similar in the past, but it usually involved two mastery pages being named exactly the same or some weird special character used in the mastery page.  From looking at your pages, I only see one page that has a special character, which is your def/tank/sup bondofstone page.  Can you try deleting the slashes just to see if this has any kind of impact on being able to save your pages at all?

Reply back and let me know!

Well i took them out just in case but today when I loaded league it worked fine.
I feel like something glitched with that page that I tried to make on the fly because even today it was still empty even though I'd tried to fill it like 5 times yesterday.
Well as it is it's all ok now so that's that???

It seems like!  Glad to hear that it's working though!  ^.^

If you experience any further issues at all, don't hesitate to create a thread and let us know!
